includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: Series premiere. Drama about the lives of four friends on Wisteria Lane. A neighbour mysteriously commits suicide.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Series premiere. Drama about the lives of four friends on Wisteria Lane. A neighbour mysteriously commits suicide.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Series premiere. Drama about the lives of four friends on Wisteria Lane. A neighbour mysteriously commits suicide.

includedAssets.title: Ah, But Underneath
includedAssets.synopsis: The ladies find an anonymous letter in Mary Alice's belongings that suggests that she was hiding a terrible secret.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The ladies find an anonymous letter in Mary Alice's belongings that suggests that she was hiding a terrible secret.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The ladies find an anonymous letter in Mary Alice's belongings that suggests that she was hiding a terrible secret.

includedAssets.title: Pretty Little Picture
includedAssets.synopsis: The four ladies decide to organize the dinner that the late Mary Alice was planning. Karl returns to Wisteria Lane to discuss terms with Susan.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The four ladies decide to organize the dinner that the late Mary Alice was planning. Karl returns to Wisteria Lane to discuss terms with Susan.

includedAssets.title: Who's That Woman?
includedAssets.synopsis: Mrs. Huber figures out that Susan was involved in Edie's house fire and tries to blackmail her. Carlos suspects that Gabrielle is having an affair.

includedAssets.title: Come In, Stranger
includedAssets.synopsis: A break-in leaves the neighbours feeling vulnerable, especially Susan, who reluctantly accepts a date with police officer Rick Thompson.

includedAssets.title: Running To Stand Still
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep6 - Running To Stand Still
includedAssets.synopsis: Lynette locks horns at the twins' school with officious mum Maisy Gibbons, who wants to put on a politically correct Little Red Riding Hood play.

includedAssets.synopsis: Susan is upset when an unexpected house guest forces Mike to postpone their date. Lynette grows more dependent on the twins' medication.

includedAssets.title: Guilty
includedAssets.synopsis: After Andrew accidentally runs over Carlos' mother, Bree and Rex help their son cover the incident up by disposing of the car and the evidence.

includedAssets.title: Suspicious Minds
includedAssets.synopsis: Gabrielle puts on a Halston fashion show, showcasing the ladies of Wisteria Lane. Susan learns of Gabrielle's secret.

includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep14 - Love Is In The Air

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Four neighbours on Wisteria Lane try to uncover the secrets behind their friend’s suicide, while dealing with their own personal problems. Smash-hit drama series starring Teri Hatcher, Felicity Huffman, Marcia Cross and Eva Longoria.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Four neighbours try to uncover the secrets behind their friend’s suicide.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Four neighbours on Wisteria Lane try to uncover the secrets behind their friend’s suicide, while dealing with their own personal problems. Smash-hit drama series starring Teri Hatcher, Felicity Huffman, Marcia Cross and Eva Longoria.

includedIn.title: Desperate Housewives
includedIn.synopsis: Four suburban housewives find their lives taking a shocking turn when their friend and neighbour unexpectedly commits suicide. But her tragic death turns out to be just the start of a string of shadowy and salacious goings-on on Wisteria Lane.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Four housewives' lives are devastated when their friend commits suicide, but that's just the start of a string of shocking events on Wisteria Lane.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Four suburban housewives find their lives taking a shocking turn when their friend and neighbour unexpectedly commits suicide. But her tragic death turns out to be just the start of a string of shadowy and salacious goings-on on Wisteria Lane.

title: Desperate Housewives Seasons 1-8
synopsis: The secrets, lies, tragedies and heartbreaks of four neighbours on Wisteria Lane, narrated by their deceased friend. Smash-hit drama series starring Teri Hatcher, Felicity Huffman, Marcia Cross and Eva Longoria.
shortSynopsis: Smash-hit drama delving into the secrets, lies and heartbreaks of four neighbours. Teri Hatcher, Felicity Huffman, Marcia Cross and Eva Longoria star.
